General.Name: C&A Modas S.A
General.Description: C&A Modas S.A. operates as a fashion retailer in Brazil. The company engages in the online and offline retail sale of apparel, footwear, accessories, cell phones, watches, costume jewelry, cosmetics, and others. It is also involved in the provision of financial intermediation services in the form of credit to finance purchases; issuance of credit cards; granting personal loans; and intermediation in brokering and promoting the distribution of insurance, capitalization bonds, and related products offered by insurers and other third parties. The company sells its products through 319 stores, as well as through various forms of e-commerce. The company was founded in 1841 and is based in Barueri, Brazil. C&A Modas S.A. operates as a subsidiary of COFRA Holding AG.
